attributes.action: CHANGE THE NHS CHOOSE AND BOOK SYSTEM IMMEDIATELY.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THE CHOOSE AND BOOK SYSTEM WAS INTRODUCED WITH THE USUAL FANFARE OF "MORE PATIENT CHOICE" etc. HOWEVER IN PRACTICE YOU CANNOT BOOK WITH A SURGEON OF YOUR CHOICE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES THAT THE APPOINTMENT WILL BE WITH THE NAMED SURGEON BUT JUST A MEMBER OF HIS TEAM OR ANY SURGEON FROM THE GENERAL SURGERY DEPARTMENT. WHAT IS THE POINT OF HAVING DETAILED INFORMATION AVAILABLE ON EVERY CONSULTANT IF YOU CANNOT GET TO SEE THE ONE OF YOUR CHOICE?

rejection.details: Please re-submit without BLOCK CAPS as they are more difficult for people to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
